nl.BobbinWork.diagram.model
Class Range

java.lang.Object
  nl.BobbinWork.diagram.model.Range

public class Range
extends java.lang.Object

A range of individual bobbins (alias threads) or pairs of bobbins. The numbers do not stick to the bobbins/pairs, but to the positions taken by the (pairs of) bobbins. That means after each cross/twist/stitch the bobbins are counted again from left to right.

Lace makers start counting with one, so in the XML source, numbers also start with one.

The numbers are not overall numbers for the whole project, but relative within the ancestor, that is the group of bobbins required for the stitch or motive being described.

Author:
J. Pol
